review: I've found the shirt to be "as advertised".  Love wearing it but find myself lifting my leg when I go to the bathroom. Also have an irresistible urge to hump the leg of anyone who comes over. Maybe washing it would help but I love the smell of it since I rolled on some road kill.  Must admit the bixxxhes love me when I have it on. Do they make matching boxers?
productTitle: The Mountain Men's Three Wolf Moon Short Sleeve Tee
